property.name: anth.wdc.outputPath
property.description: Where to store the extraction result (YOU CAN IGNORE THIS ONE).

property.name: anth.wdc.evilNamespaces
property.description: Exclude namesspaces which cause title and css links to be included as triples.

property.name: anth.wdc.noEvilNamespaces
property.description: Allow namespaces which are subsets of evilNamespaces to be included.

property.name: anth.scoring.classifier.PropsFilePath
property.description: The path to the config file for the online classifier.
